full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA'I KHRID YIG CHEN MO DKA' BA'I GNAD RNAMS GSAL BAR BKOD PA'I LAM RIM RAB GSAL ME LONG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @133B (CES BOD GANGS CAN GYI MKHAS SHING GRUB PA BRNYES PA'I SKYES BU DAM PA MANG PO'I MAN NGAG ZHAL SHES DANG, DBEN SA BKA' BRGYUD KYI MAN NGAG ZHAL SHES KYI NOR BU DE DAG NI, 'DUL 'DZIN MCHOG GYUR KUN GYIS SPAS PA'I DKA' GNAD YIN PAS YI GER GSAL BAR 'GOD MI RUNG MOD, ,'ON KYANG DAM TSIG DANG LDAN PA RNAMS LA PHAN PA'I CHED DU, ,BLA MA MKHA' 'GRO CHOS SKYOD LA DGONGS PA ZHUS NAS, ,SHIN TU GSAL BAR BKOD PA'I BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA'I 'KHRID YIG CHEN MO RAB GSAL ME LONG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, AOR TU SU'I HAR GIN PE SE'I SHOG LA BLA DPON SOGS SER SPYA DRAG ZHAN MANG PO LA, BYANG CHUB LAM RIM GYI 'KHRID RGYAS PAR PHOG SKABS, ,BOD GANGS CAN KYI PHO RI BA ^THU'U BKVAN RIN PO CHE'I BLA SMAN RAB 'BYAMS PA SKAL BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN GYIS, ,KHYED KYIS GNANG BA'I LAM RIM 'DI NI BLO DMAN DAG LA PHAN CHE BAR 'DUG PAS, ,'DI NANG @134A *, ,LTAR SNGON BYUNG GI LO RGYUS DANG DPE DANG BCAS SHAN SBYAR TE SHIN TU GSAL ZHING GO BDE BAR BKOD PA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES, ,RIN CHEN GNYIS PA'I MAndAL KHA BTAGS BCAS KYI LAG 'BUL DANG BCAS TE NAN TAN CHEN POS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, [???] 'DUN YOD PA'I THOG TU NYE CHAR YID NA, ,DAM PA DE NYID KYI DRUNG YIG CHEN MO RIG GNAS LA SHIN TU MKHAS PA CUNG GAR MED GEN CHOS RJE YE SHES DPAL LDAN GYIS KYANG NAN TU BSKUL BA DANG, RAB GNAS DGON PA'I BLA MA LAS SNA SOGS KYIS KYANG BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, ,DAM PA MANG PO'I ZHABS RDUL SPYI BOR LEN PA, ,CHOS MING BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS KYIS RANG GI RTZA BA'I BLA MA RIN PO CHE RA SGRENG RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO DANG, 'DUL 'DZIN CHEN PO BLO BZANG YE SHES BSTAN 'DZIN SOGS KYI GSUNG RAGS RIM TZAM ZHIG BLOR NGES PA DANG, 'GA' ZHIG ZIN BRIS SU BTAB PA RNAMS LA GZHI BYAS NAS, ,SNGON BYUNG GI GTAM DPE DANG SHAN SBYAR TE SA YOS LOR GO BDE BAR LEGS PAR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI, BSKUL BA PO MER GEN CHOS KYI YE SHES DPAL LDAN RANG NYID DO, ,'DI LA BRTEN NAS RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
